blogPost.title: Joe Biden wants America's net greenhouse-gas emissions to reach zero by 2050, and the electricity sector to be emissions-free by 2035. What will it take to get there? https://t.co/OXbWEHM8dL

localize.full_text: 乔-拜登希望美国的温室气体净排放量在2050年达到零，电力部门在2035年实现无排放。要达到这个目标，需要做些什么？https://t.co/OXbWEHM8dL
